system.description: A complex took which can be used to split a coin in half and restamp the blank side. By taking 30 minutes, a character with a Coin Splitter can take up to 100 Crowns and split them, creating double to number of coins. These coins are thinner but this can only be determined with a DC: 18 Awareness check. If a character has a set of Merchant's Tools they can use the included scale to automatically know the coins have been split.
